text: Keith Bradshaw (2 October 1963 - 8 November 2021) was an Australian cricketer, accountant and administrator. He was a right-handed batsman who played in 25 first-class and nine List A limited-over matches for Tasmania between 1984â€“85 and 1987-88. In November 2011 it was announced that South Australian Cricket Association had appointed Bradshaw as its next CEO. Bradshaw died from multiple myeloma on 8 November 2021, aged 58. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from multiple myeloma Category:Australian cricketers Category:Sportspeople from Hobart
title: Keith Bradshaw (cricketer)
